name: Tommy Oliver - "Rainbow" Ranger Online Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Over the course of his career as a Power Ranger, Tommy Oliver has been several different colors when morphed. What was the first color he appeared as?
questions.explanation:
Green.

	The first time Tommy appeared as a Power Ranger was as the evil green Power Ranger. Eventually the other five "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers" broke the spell and he joined the team. As the green Ranger he commanded the Dragonzord.

questions.text: What item made Tommy's first Ranger outfit different than all the others on the team?
options: His helmet was a different color than his suit.
He carried a set of handcuffs and a longsword.
His boots weren't white, but instead the same color as the suit.
questions.explanation:
He had a golden shield.

	When Tommy was the evil green Ranger he had the golden Dragon Shield, which allowed him to harness more power than the five "normal" Rangers. When he turned back to the side of law and order he retained the shield and eventually became unofficial team leader. As the evil Rita Repulsa drained his powers, the audience learned that the shield was transferrable to other Rangers.

questions.text: Tommy became the official leader in the season two episode "White Light".
questions.explanation:
True.

	His green Ranger powers were destroyed by Rita Repulsa and he had tried to return to life as a "normal" human. After the Rangers were overpowered, mentors Zordon and Alpha 5 decided to create a new Ranger. Tommy was instilled with the Power of Goodness, and put in place as the new team leader.

questions.text: With the original power coins destroyed, who granted Tommy and his teammates the power of the Ninja Rangers, which came with new zords?
questions.explanation:
Ninjor.

	When the power coins were destroyed, the Rangers all had to go find Ninjor to attempt regain their powers. Ninjor couldn't restore their original powers, but instead forged new powers for the Rangers. They became the Ninja Rangers, and while their morphed forms looked basically the same, they had new zords to go with their powers. Tommy's new zord was the Falcolnzord.

questions.text: What color did Tommy become when the Rangers gained the powers of the Zeo crystal?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	Tommy became Zeo Ranger V, and remained the team leader. As the red Zeo Ranger he had a star shaped visor on his helmet and commanded Zeo Zord V. His Zord was based on a phoenix and formed most of the midsection of the Zeo Megazord. He also is the pilot of the Red Battlezord later in the "Power Rangers Zeo" season.

questions.text: Shifting into "Power Rangers Turbo" Tommy retains the color he was in the Zeo season, but is no longer the team leader.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Midway through the "Turbo" season is when Tommy, along with the rest of the original Rangers all left the show. Tommy, while still a Ranger, had remained the team leader though up until then. The Rangers earned their "Turbo" powers in the second theatrically released film "Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie" that predated the debut of the series.

questions.text: Which set of Ranger powers did Tommy have during the "Forever Red" episode in "Power Rangers Wild Force"?
questions.explanation:
Zeo.

	Tommy, using his restored Zeo powers, lead a group of other red Rangers from several seasons of the series. He appeared in a morphed form alongside T.J., who had taken over the Turbo powers from Tommy. In this episode he was already revered as a legendary Ranger, and he still had another entire series to star in during his career.

questions.text: Several years after leaving the franchise, the character of Tommy Oliver returned for "Power Rangers Dino Thunder" as the black Ranger. What had the character done in the years he was off the show?
questions.correct: He earned a PhD in paleontology.
options: He was elected to the U.S. Senate.
He returned to his roots among the forces of evil.
questions.explanation:
He earned a PhD in paleontology.

	At one point, during the "Wild Force" appearance he was shown to own a juice bar.  Apparently he grew tired of that and went to college, and graduate school. He showed up in the premiere of "Dino Thunder" with his degree in hand and began teaching high school science.

questions.text: During which season of the series did Tommy operate the Brachiozord?
questions.explanation:
Dino Thunder.

	After the initial 3-year run of "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers" the show began rebranding every year to change the name, and often the cast. "Zeo", "Turbo" "Wild Force" "Dino Thunder" and more than a dozen more names were used throughout the first 800 episodes of the series.  Jason David Frank, as Tommy Oliver, appeared in 221 episodes (across six different series) of the show and two theatrically released movies.

questions.text: In "Power Rangers Super Megaforce" Tommy Oliver appeared as two different Rangers. One was the iconic green Ranger, and the other as the white Ranger. Which weapon did he use in his unmorphed state to save a child?
questions.explanation:
Saba.

	Among the options only Saba and the Dragon Dagger were weapons he used as a ranger. The Dragon Dagger was used with his green Ranger powers and Saba accompanied his white Ranger powers. Saba had previously only been seen with Tommy in his morphed state. In this episode Tommy showed up as the white Ranger when he saved the child on the bridge, though only his helmet flashed over his face and Saba was seen. Later in the episode he appeared in full morphed state as the green Ranger.
